channel.title: Okay so I am done my server
channel.description: And I want people to play it. I realize I must port forward to do so but my ISP won't let me have a static IP. Do I need a ststic IP to host?

item.title: Okay so I am done my server
item.dc:creator: @Cuban0_Ftw Cuban0 Ftw
item.description:
@Cuban0_Ftw wrote:

No a static IP simply means is that YOUR IP address will never chance unless you make adjustments. You can host your server without it, you just have to make sure it doesn’t change and if it does you need to update it in your server sources folder.

Read full topic
item.source: Okay so I am done my server
